description: Nice trails up to Mount Adams, 1200m elevation gain in 7kms. The top of the mountain can be exposed and you need good boots and warm clothes. We took the Air Line trail up, and the Valley Way on the way down.
directions: From the town of Gorham take HWY 2 to the Appalachia parking lot, which is about 7kms away from the town.
title: Mount Adams
